# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-lcm-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/nfvo-lcm/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/nfvo-lcm-1.1.0-20170120.063902-55.zip" && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-lcm-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f nfvo-lcm-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8403
RUN echo Open-O nfvo-lcm 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/nfvo-lcm/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/nfvo-lcm-1.1.0-20170120.063902-55.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
